                "---\u003eRollback executed now\nmysql\u003e ROLLBACk;\n\nmysql\u003e SELECT * FROM testTable;\n+-----+\n| tId |\n+-----+\n|   1 |\n+-----+\n---\u003eRollback removed all rows which all are not committed"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

                  [
                    "c"

                ","

                  [
                    "c"

                ]

                " or "
              ],
              [
                "INSERT",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " statement not preceded with a "
              ],
              [
                "BEGIN",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " or "
              ],

                "START TRANSACTION",

                  [
                    "c"
